RStudio Team Trial Edition - Getting Started

Welcome to RStudio Team Trial Edition!

RStudio Team Trial Edition includes evaluation versions of RStudio Professional products that are pre-installed and pre-configured to make it easy for you try them on your own machine.

Log in to RStudio Connect » Take a Tour of RStudio Connect »

Quick Links

RStudio Server Pro RStudio Connect Package Manager Webmail Help

RStudio Professional Products

RStudio Professional products help enterprises support data science by managing development environments, fostering collaboration, providing a content hub for data products, and providing consistent package management.

RStudio Server Pro

Delivers productivity, security, metrics, and commercial support that professional data science teams need to develop at scale.

Log in » More info »

RStudio Connect

Push-button publishing and deployment of data products, including Shiny apps, R Markdown documents, and Plumber APIs.

Log in » More info »

RStudio Package Manager

Repository management server to organize and centralize R packages across your team, department, or entire organization.

Log in » More info »

Purchase RStudio Professional Products

For more information about running RStudio Professional products on your own enterprise infrastructure or details about pricing, please contact our sales team.
